body:
I would like to add support to build bitcoin core for arm android devices using the depends system., enabling compilation of bitcoin-qt for tablets, phones etc. 

an effort for iOS is here :- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12557

I have managed to build bitcoind for android using :- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16110 but that is aarch64. My understanding is that most devices now use arm7. 

**Dependencies** 

Current system allows builds for arm7 as far as i can tell but no QT support, so I started here :- https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/android-building.html# adding `$(package)_config_opts_android = -xplatform android-clang`to depends/packages/qt.mk

That is currenctly failing with :- `ERROR: Cannot find Android SDK. Please use -android-sdk option to specify one.` 

i did `sudo apt install android-sdk android-sdk-platform-tools android-sdk-platform-23`

But that did not help. 

**Particulars**
The build is being attempted on 0.18.0
Ubuntu 18.04 
intel i5 
8gb ram
title: depends : Add full android support including QT
